Interface LockAndMintParams

The parameters for a cross-chain transfer onto Ethereum.

Hierarchy

  • TransferParamsCommon
    • LockAndMintParams

Index

Properties

Optional confirmations

confirmations: undefined | number
  • Defined in parameters.ts:107

The number of confirmations to wait before submitting the signature to Ethereum. If this number is less than the default, the RenVM transaction is returned when those confirmations have passed, before the signature is available, and will not be submitted to Ethereum.

Optional contractCalls

contractCalls: ContractCall[]
  • Defined in parameters.ts:114

Details for submitting one or more Ethereum transactions. The last one will be augmented with the three required parameters for minting - the amount, nHash and RenVM signature.

Optional deposit

deposit: UTXOIndex
  • Defined in parameters.ts:121

Specify which deposit should be send to RenVM instead of waiting for one to be observed. This deposit must have been sent to the gateway address of the transfer.

Optional gatewayAddress

gatewayAddress: undefined | string
  • Defined in parameters.ts:129

Specify a gateway address. Gateway addresses are based on the RenVM shard selected to process the transfer. Currently there is only one RenVM shard, but once sharding is live, this parameter will ensure that the same address can be used to resume the transfer.

Optional nonce

nonce: undefined | string

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.nonce

  • Defined in parameters.ts:83

An option to override the default nonce generated randomly.

sendToken

sendToken: RenContract | "BTC" | "ZEC" | "BCH"

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.sendToken

  • Defined in parameters.ts:66

The token, including the origin and destination chains.

Optional suggestedAmount

suggestedAmount: NumberValue
  • Defined in parameters.ts:99

The amount of sendToken that should be sent.

Optional tags

tags: [string]

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.tags

  • Defined in parameters.ts:89

Provide optional tags which can be used to look up transfers in the lightnodes.

Optional txHash

txHash: undefined | string

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.txHash

  • Defined in parameters.ts:78

Provide the transaction hash returned from RenVM to continue a previous mint.

Optional web3Provider

web3Provider: provider

Inherited from TransferParamsCommon.web3Provider

  • Defined in parameters.ts:72

A web3 provider must be provided if RenJS is submitting or reading transactions to/from Ethereum.
